sample test form.

Steps to reproduce:

* $defaults write com.apple.Finder AppleShowAllFiles YES
* (restart finder)
* (restart firefox)

DOTTED files (~/.ssh) show up fine in FINDER.

In a web 'file upload' form, the uploader won't see them.
